data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Saint Elizabeth who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Elizabeth, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint Elizabeth.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 152,000 souls living in the state of Saint Elizabeth with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Saint Elizabeth, Jamaica from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Malvern
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Malvern, Saint Elizabeth, Jamaica.
Lord, to the people of Saint Elizabeth you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Saint Elizabeth.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Saint Elizabeth that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

location.name: Saint Elizabeth
location.cities_list: Santa Cruz, Black River, Malvern, Lacovia, Balaclava
location.cities_list_w_pop: Santa Cruz (8,217), Black River (4,229), Malvern (3,291), Lacovia (3,187), Balaclava (2,862)
